channel.title: Bits and Bytes on The Perennial Beginner

item.title: November 24, 2019
item.description:
Projects nlp Analysis of data science topic trends on Medium.com since 2009 [ Shiny dashboard ] post Python packages that take data science project write-ups beyond Jupyter notebooks [ Intelligence Refinery ]
Fun finds cicerone Create guided tours of Shiny applications using driver.js. reactable Interactive data tables for R, based on the React Table library and made with reactR.
